content: for everyone out there enamored with little pet costumes for halloween here s a fun and easy pattern to keep your cat in the loop and cozy too this pattern is a simple ribbed sweater meant to look like a pumpkin with a jack o lantern face added to the finished object either via duplicate stitching or embroidery sizes included are for small medium or large cats corresponding to a cat body circumference of 9-11 12-14 15-17 - feel free to customize to your particular cats needs so that they are comfortable the test knit for this was knit in a size medium for a cat with a semi-fluffy circumference of 14 materials main color yarn - 60 70 80 grams worsted weight wool 140 160 180 yd 130 150 165 m contrasting color yarn - 2 grams worsted weight wool 5 yd 5 m sample is knit with patons classic wool worsted in main color pumpkin and contrasting color black
